PageWidgetPortable.Title: Itens Aquisição>Comprados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOITENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>( A.AQUISICAO IN (SELECT AQUISICAO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA WHERE HANDLE IN (SELECT ORDEMCOMPRA FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS WHERE PRODUTO IN (SELECT PRODUTO FROM LC_AQUISICAOITENS WHERE HANDLE = A.HANDLE))) )OR ( A.STATUS = 7 ) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1801_at3657_hs819b3cf8.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Julgamento>Comercial>Classificados>Fornecedores
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.DESCLASSIFICADO <> 'S' AND A.DESCLASSIFICADODOCUMENTOS <> 'S' AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT PARTICIPANTE FROM LC_AQUISICAOCOTACOESITEM WHERE STATUS <> 2 AND AQUISICAO = A.AQUISICAO) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1803_at3620_hsd2c5136.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Julgamento>Comercial>Desclassificados>Fornecedores
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.DESCLASSIFICADO = 'S' OR DESCLASSIFICADODOCUMENTOS = 'S') OR A.HANDLE IN (SELECT PARTICIPANTE FROM LC_AQUISICAOCOTACOESITEM WHERE SELECIONADO <> 'S' AND A.DESCLASSIFICADO <> 'S' AND STATUS = 2 AND AQUISICAO = A.AQUISICAO AND AQUISICAOITEM NOT IN (SELECT AQUISICAOITEM FROM LC_AQUISICAOCOTACOESITEM WHERE SELECIONADO = 'S' AND PARTICIPANTE = A.HANDLE ) ) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1803_at3621_hs7543e8db.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Julgamento>Habilitação>Inabilitados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.ARVOREHABILITACAO='S' AND A.HABILITADO='N' AND JULGADOHABILITACAO='S') OR (INABILITADOPORINVERSAO='S')) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1803_at2212_hs13c4cb2a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Julgamento>Vencedores
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PARTICIPANTE IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM GN_PESSOAS WHERE EHFORNECEDOR = 'S' AND HANDLE IN (SELECT FORNECEDOR FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRA WHERE
AQUISICAO=@RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES) AND FORNECEDOR IN (SELECT PARTICIPANTE FROM LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES
WHERE AQUISICAO=@RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES)))) OR A.PARTICIPANTE IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM GN_PESSOAS WHERE EHFORNECEDOR = 'S' AND HANDLE IN (SELECT PARTICIPANTE FROM LC_AQUISICAOPARTICIPANTES WHERE
AQUISICAO=@RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES) AND HANDLE IN (SELECT PARTICIPANTE FROM LC_AQUISICAOCOTACOESITEM WHERE
AQUISICAO=@RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES) AND SELECIONADO='S'))) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1803_at3628_hs60033741.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Log e-mail
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_GN_LOGEMAIL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TABELAORIGEM = (SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS WHERE NOME = 'LC_AQUISICOES') AND (A.HANDLEORIGEM = @RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3904_at6095_hsf619439a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Recursos/Impugnação>Aprovar
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_AQUISICAORECURSOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 2 AND ((A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S')) ) AND (A.AQUISICAO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1804_at6106_hs2820dbf8.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Termo de referência
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_TR.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLE IN (SELECT REQUISICAO.TERMOREFERENCIA FROM LC_REQUISICOES REQUISICAO WHERE REQUISICAO.AQUISICAOGERADA = @RASTRO(LC_AQUISICOES)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t5780_at8355_hs2481fa8d.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
